titleStmt.title: SII 4.340: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 340. (A.R. No. 17 of 1890). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila yum poṟ yappāvaiyum cirttaniccelviyun=taṉ perun=teviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭuntuyilū
ḻiyuḷiṭaituṟaiṉāṭu ntuṭarvaṉavelippaṭar vaṉavāciyum cuḷḷicūḻmatiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum ṉaṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭak
kamum porukaṭa liḻattaraicarta muṭiyum Āṅkavaṉṟeviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkal teṉnavaṉ vaitta cuntaramuṭiyu min=tira ṉāramu n=teṇ
Īḻamaṇṭalamuḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaikkeraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭum kulataṉamākiya p(ā)lar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatirmālaiyuñ caṅkatir ve
About five to six lines are missing. The existing impression does not show any traces of them.yāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittiraneṭuṅkaṭa luttiralāṭamum veṟimalart tirtta teṟipuṉaṟ
kaṅkaiyum ṉaṭuvuṭ palakalañ celuttic caṅkirāmavicayottuṅkapanmaṉākiya kiṭārattaraiyaṉai vākayam
pakkariyoṭu ṭutturimaiyilp piṟakkiya perunitippirakkamum Ārtta vaṉakaṉakar porttoḻilvācalil vicjātara toraṇa
motto ṇipputavamum kaṉamaṇikkatavamum niṟai śrīvijaiyamum tuṟainirp paṉṉaiyum vaṉmalaiyū
yūrum Āḻkaṭalakaḻcūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamum kalaṅkā valviṉai Ilaṅkācokamum koppuṟu
ṉal māppapāḷamum kāvalampuricai mevilipaṅkamum viḷaippa[ ntū] ṟi
ṭai vaḷaippantūṟum kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaittakkolamum titamāva
lviṉai mātamaliṅkamum kalāmutirkkaṭuntiṟal Ilāmuritecamum
teṉakkalarpoḻil māṉakkavāramum toṭukaṭaṟkāvaṟkaṭu
muraṭ(k)kaṭāramum māpporutaṇṭāl koṇṭa kopparakecari
vanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājen=tiracoḻatevaṟkku yāṇṭu 31 Āvatu [jaya]
ṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu perumpāṇapāṭi
karaivaḻi tiruvallamuṭaiya par(ā)meśvararkku valaṅkai
nittaviṉotaterin=tavalaṅkaiveḷaik n=tāviḷakkoṉṟi nukku
viṭṭa Āṭutoṇṇūṟum tiruvuṇṇāḻikai Uṭaiyārkaḷum
vakammikaḷum kaik candrādittavar muṭṭā
mai celuttuvo heśvarar
rakṣaiThe following six lines are engraved at the end of this inscription:— 1 m tiruvallattu sa • • • • vūr śiva- 2 brāhmaṇan kau • • • tu ippaṭi 3 aṟiveṉ kuṇṭu • • • mutakrama- 4 vittaṉen ippaṭi • • • • tevarkku 5 tirumeyppūccukku vaitta • • • 6 lai ittevarkku tiruviḷa • • • ||*
Digital edition of SII 4.340 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
